basics.name: Emanuele Buchicchio
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an italian software engineer and researcher with a lifelong passion for the intersection of science and technology.  CTO at Smartpeg and a Research Affiliate at the University of Perugia. I hold a Ph.D. in Computer Engineering (2024) and an MBA (2011), specializing in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence, Electronic Measurements, and Software Engineering. My work focuses on developing dependable, data-driven solutions for HR management and quantifying uncertainty in ML-based systems. I am a passionate advocate for software quality and an active member of the IEEE and ACM communities

work.name: University of Perugia - Department of Engineering - Electronic MEasurements Research Laboratory (EMELab)
work.summary: Research activities in the field of software engineering, machine learning and artificial intelligence. Focus on uncertainty quantification in machine learning-based systems and dependable AI applications.

work.name: Smartpeg S.r.l.
work.summary: Analysis, design and development of web applications for private companies and public bodies with Java Enterprise technology, Spring, .Net, .Net Core, single page application JavaScript (Angular); relational databases and NoSQL. Cloud-based solutions (Microsoft Azure, Google cloud, Amazon AWS). Design and development of IT systems and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions for industrial applications. Data science, machine learning and artificial intelligence projects. Definition of the software development process and company standards for quality management (ISO 9000) and information security (ISO 27000).

work.name: Pegaso 2000 S.r.l.
work.summary: Analysis, design and development of web applications for private companies and public bodies with Java Enterprise technology, Spring, .Net, single page application JavaScript (AngularJS, jQuery, jQueyUI); relational databases (SQL Server, Oracle)

work.name: Gianos Consulting S.r.l.
work.summary: Design and development of web and mobile applications for private businesses and government bodies, leveraging REST and SOAP web services, ASP.NET, Java8/JavaEE/Spring4, JavaScript single-page frameworks (AngularJS, jQuery, jQueryUI), Oracle and SQL Server databases, CRM solutions with Sage SalesLogix, and business intelligence/reporting tools such as Crystal Reports XI and Microsoft Reporting Service.

work.name: Eles Semiconductor Equipment
work.summary: Managed the life cycle of software and firmware products, including requirements analysis, feasibility studies for new products, and defining roadmaps for existing product evolution. Responsible for technical and marketing documentation, as well as training on software products and developing course materials.

work.name: Eles Semiconductor Equipment
work.summary: Designed and developed software products using the Microsoft .NET platform, C#, and Visual C++. Defined development processes based on ISO9000 and CMMI quality management models.
